<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2865</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Applying for study at a Language Seminar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beantragen Studie an einem Sprachenseminar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demande concernant l'étude à une conférence de
langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aplicar-se para o estudo em um seminário da 
língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Facendo domanda per lo studio ad un seminario di 
linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ισχύσει για τη μελέτη σε ένα γλωσσικό σεμινάριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El solicitar estudio en un seminario del 
lenguaje</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a written activity where students fill in an application for a language seminarm and answer questions about their choices and decisions, includes an assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">decision making</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">application</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine schriftliche 
Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer eine Anwendung für ein 
Sprachenseminarm ausfüllen und Fragen über ihre Wahlen und 
Entscheidungen beantworten, enthält eine Einschätzung Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité écrite où 
les étudiants complètent une demande de seminarm de langage et 
répondent à des questions au sujet de leurs choix et décisions, 
inclut une rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade escrita 
onde os estudantes preencham uma aplicação para um seminarm da 
língua e respondam a perguntas sobre suas escolhas e decisões, 
inclui um rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività scritta 
dove gli allievi riempono una domanda di seminarm di linguaggio e 
rispondono alle domande circa le loro scelte e decisioni, include una 
rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια γραπτή δραστηριότητα 
όπου οι σπουδαστές συμπληρώνουν μια εφαρμογή για μια γλώσσα 
seminarm και απαντούν στις ερωτήσεις για τις επιλογές και τις 
αποφάσεις τους, περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad escrita
donde los estudiantes completan una aplicación para un seminarm del 
lenguaje y contestan a preguntas sobre sus opciones y decisiones, 
incluye una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschlußfassung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">prise de décision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">application</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
